channel.title: Physician Exhume bugs if converted the same night
channel.description:
When I exhumed a dead butler, a glitch occurred. I was both prevented and converted that night, and this led to the exhume result of "killed by possessor" being repeatedly spammed, rather than just receiving it once.
based on my experience earlier in the game, i can assume this should not have happened
Screenshot is located on my steam page: https://steamcommunity.com/id/AreYouThreateningMe_MasterJedi/screenshots/

item.title: Physician Exhume bugs if converted the same night
item.dc:creator: TheSenate
item.description:
I had a hunch that this was the case.

Just a guess though.

Can’t be sure.

Read full topic
item.source: Physician Exhume bugs if converted the same night

item.title: Physician Exhume bugs if converted the same night

item.description:
Something tells me that that Observer may have been killed by a Possessor. Not sure why though. Gut feeling?
